name: Together in the Rain
description:
You are a water drop, sliding down the window pane of existence.
Join together with other glass-residing drops to allow your descent into the future.

Uses Controller or Keyboard.

The theme inspired us in all different directions and we landed on that feeling when you stare out of a window in the rain, you watch each drip falling down, joining with other drops to make their journey down together, what do they see as they fall? Does anything look cooler than neon signs in the rain? Does it Rain in space?

All these will probably not be answered in our game!

Together in the rain!
